title: Parkridge Polish Seniors Championship
text: The Parkridge Polish Seniors Open was a men's senior (over 50) professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="European%20Seniors%20Tour">European Seniors Tour</a>, held at the Krakow Valley Golf and Country Club near <a href="Krzeszowice">Krzeszowice</a> in southern <a href="Poland">Poland</a>. It was held just once, in 2008, and was won by <a href="Ian%20Woosnam">Ian Woosnam</a> who finished a shot ahead of <a href="Domingo%20Hospital">Domingo Hospital</a>. The total prize fund was €280,000 with the winner receiving €42,000.
